sys_script_include.name: UserManagement

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_f22ca1a797136110d70ef207f053afc1
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_424426_devops.UserManagement</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>UserManagement</name><script><![CDATA[var UserManagement = Class.create();
UserManagement.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },

	assignAdmins: function () {
		const userPrefGr = new GlideRecord('sys_user_preference');
		userPrefGr.addQuery('name', 'x_424426_devops_make_me_admin');
		userPrefGr.addQuery('user.roles', 'admin');
		userPrefGr.query();
		
		const adminUsers = [];
		while (userPrefGr.next()) {
			adminUsers.push(userPrefGr.getValue('user'));
		}
		
		const userRoleGr = new GlideRecord('sys_user_has_role');
		userRoleGr.addQuery('role.name', 'x_424426_devops.devops_admin');
		userRoleGr.query();
		
		const existingAdmins = [];
		while (userRoleGr.next()) {
			existingAdmins.push(userRoleGr.getValue('user'));
		}
		
		const newAdmins = adminUsers.filter(x => !existingAdmins.includes(x));
		newAdmins.forEach(userSysID => {
			const userRoleGr = new GlideRecord('sys_user_has_role');
			userRoleGr.newRecord();
			userRoleGr.user = userSysID;
			userRoleGr.role.setDisplayValue('x_424426_devops.devops_admin');
			userRoleGr.insert();
		});
	},
	
    type: 'UserManagement'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-06-14 06:21:02</sys_created_on><sys_id>f22ca1a797136110d70ef207f053afc1</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>UserManagement</sys_name><sys_package display_value="DevOps+" source="x_424426_devops">0b41a31b97cf2110d70ef207f053afb0</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="DevOps+">0b41a31b97cf2110d70ef207f053afb0</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_f22ca1a797136110d70ef207f053afc1</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-06-14 09:36:54</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
